title: 'Criminals' Taking Advantage Of Situation In Baltimore, Obama Says
description: The president said "there's no excuse for the kind of violence" that has erupted after peaceful protests following the death of a black man who suffered a serious spine injury while in police custody.

title: Indianapolis: Tensions Stir As Murder Rate Surges
description: Most of the suspects – and most of the victims – are young black men. That's opened up a difficult conversation about race and class.

title: David Breashears Describes Devastation At Everest Base Camp
description: The filmmaker and mountaineer survived the deadly avalanche caused by the weekend's earthquake in Nepal.

title: Historians Look Back At The Midwest, America's 'Forgotten' Region
description: A group of historians say the Midwest's rich landscape and cultural diversity are too often left out of elementary school classrooms.

title: Have Mass Shootings Led To More Gun Control?
description: After the mass shootings in Aurora and Newtown, many family members of victims made an emotional pleas for stricter gun control.

title: Baltimore City Councilman Responds To Unrest
description: More National Guard troops are heading to Baltimore, after rioters set police cars and buildings on fire, looted stores and threw rocks.

title: Viking's Choice: Weedeater, 'Bully'
description: Weedeater's "Bully" is a squirrely sludge-punk bruiser with bassist Dixie Dave cackling like a supervillain.

title: Supreme Court Hears Challenge To 4 States' Same-Sex-Marriage Ban
description: Justice Scalia asked whether ministers would be able to refuse to marry two gay men. Justice Alito asked, why not marry four gay men together?

title: Why We Like Falsetto, Why Melodies Matter And Other Musical Wonders
description: These are just a few of the questions that popped up during our recent All Songs Considered listening party in Boston.

title: How American Tech Giants Are Stepping In To Help Nepal
description: Facebook and Google are making it easier to identify survivors, while Twitter, Apple and PayPal are streamlining the donation process.

title: Measuring Earthquakes With More Than Just One Scale
description: Earthquakes seem to be at their cruelest when striking developing nations like Nepal. A research center has tried to calculate how vulnerable nations are based on their resources and coping skills.

title: O, Miami Celebrates Poetry for All
description: A poem for every person is the goal of the annual festival. Lines of poetry can be found on everything from dog bandanas to urinals.

title: At Long Last, It's The Peepers Big Night
description: Before frogs can start singing in the spring, a massive migration of millions of amphibians has to take place first.

title: Remote Villages In Nepal Wait For Aid
description: The official death toll has risen to more than 5,000 after Saturday's earthquake. Some of the worst-hit villages are very hard to access.

title: Tensions Running High In Baltimore After Night Of Rioting
description: National Guard troops fanned out across parts of Baltimore following violence in which about a dozen buildings were burned. Nearly 200 people were arrested.
